com.github.liblevenshtein.serialization

Interface Serializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSerializer, BytecodeSerializer, PlainTextSerializer, ProtobufSerializer

    public interface Serializer
    (De)Serialization utilities for various interchange formats.

    • Method Summary

        throws Exception
